title: Struct-like Maps
description: Model data with maps that expose methods and custom displays.
note: Shows how maps and `self` enable struct-style ergonomics.
run_instructions: Run the script, then modify the calls to `move` to see the custom display update.
how_it_works: `make_vector` returns a map that stores fields and functions using `self` for context.
Calling `move` mutates the internal state just like a struct method would.
The `@display` metamethod customizes how the map prints in logs and return values.
